description: This file defines a GoalProvider class for managing savings goals within a Flutter application. It handles fetching goals, adding new goals, updating progress, and removing goals, with backend integration via an API client.

classes.name: GoalProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class managing a list of goals with backend API integration and state management.

methods.name: fetchGoals
methods.description: Fetches the list of goals from the backend API and updates the provider state.

methods.name: addGoal
methods.description: Adds a new goal locally and attempts to save it to the backend.

methods.name: addProgress
methods.description: Increments the current amount of a goal and updates the backend.

methods.name: removeGoal
methods.description: Removes a goal locally and from the backend API.
